docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is currently in development and is not the default version. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or entering api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: index
examples:
GET /api/bookmarks
200
{
  "total": 2,
  "subtotal": 2,
  "page": 1,
  "per_page": 20,
  "search": null,
  "sort": {
    "by": null,
    "order": null
  },
  "results": [
    {
      "name": "bar",
      "controller": "hosts",
      "query": "bar=car",
      "public": false,
      "id": 298486374,
      "owner_id": null,
      "owner_type": null
    },
    {
      "name": "foo",
      "controller": "hosts",
      "query": "foo=boo",
      "public": true,
      "id": 980190962,
      "owner_id": null,
      "owner_type": null
    }
  ]
}
